text: Greg Colby (born February 25, 1952) is an American football coach. He was the defensive coordinator at Central Michigan University from 2015 to 2018. Colby served as the head football coach at Millersville University of Pennsylvania from 2008 to 2012, compiling a record of 11–44. He was the defensive coordinator at Kent State University from 1998 to 2001 and at Northwestern University from 2002 to 2007. ==Head coaching record== ===College=== ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American football linebackers Category:Central Michigan Chippewas football coaches Category:Illinois Fighting Illini baseball coaches Category:Illinois Fighting Illini baseball players Category:Illinois Fighting Illini football coaches Category:Illinois Fighting Illini football players Category:Kent State Golden Flashes football coaches Category:Michigan State Spartans football coaches Category:Millersville Marauders football coaches Category:Northwestern Wildcats football coaches Category:High school baseball coaches in the United States Category:High school football coaches in Illinois Category:People from Danville, Illinois Category:Players of American football from Illinois Category:Baseball players from Illinois
title: Greg Colby
